item.title: The Assange Case Is Collapsing – But it Remains a Travesty of Justice
item.description: Last month, a key witness against Julian Assange admitted that his testimony was false. It's further proof that this case has little to do with justice – but is a persecution designed to silence critical journalists.

item.title: Code Review is Work - Tyler Cipriani
item.description: Software companies have tried to measure productivity with time tracking, counting closed bugs, and, infamously, by counting lines of code. But what are organizations doing about the time developers lose waiting for code review?

item.title: Could Vaccinating Young People Before Old People Save More Lives?
item.description: Vaccines are tackling the COVID-19 epidemic in two ways: reducing the severity of infections, and preventing their transmission. Both mechanisms save lives, but the vaccination strategies that leverage each can be conflicting.

item.title: 8K Vrroom 40Gbps | HDFury.com | Connect and Fix everything in HDMI
item.description: The Vrroom Kit includes: Vrroom unit Choice of power supply IR RX Sensor cable (9ft) DB9 > RS232 jack cable (1ft) Jack Optical cable (4.5ft) Downscale, Passthru or Upscale VRR or ANY signal while extracting full audio from ANY HDMI source to feed ANY Audio sound system with the best possible audio formats! WORLD’S FIRST VRR and HDMI 2.1 sound extractor that allows FULL AUDIO from ANY external HDMI source to ANY HDMI/ARC or eARC sound system. State of the art HDMI 2.1 central that support ANY video and/or audio signal in existence today including VRR, DV, LLDV, HLG, HDR10+, DTS:X, ATMOS and more... Vrroom allows ANY HDMI source (FUHD sources, Blu-ray, UHD Blu-ray, media players, satellite receiver, game consoles, PCs, etc.) to be shown on ANY of the connected displays and ANY sources Full HDMI audio to be played on ANY AVR or sound system.

item.title: Agile at 20: The Failed Rebellion

item.title: Damn Interesting: To H-E-Double-Hockey-Sticks With Facebook
Is It Possible To Make IoT Devices Private? Amazon Echo Dot Does Not Wipe Personal Content After Factory Reset
